select msg_id, m.client_id, m.doctor_id, c.client_name, c.client_photo, d.doctor_name, d.doctor_photo, is_client, msg_content, is_img, m.create_time from msg m, client c, doctor d where m.is_del = '0' and m.client_id = #{clientId} and m.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and m.client_id = c.client_id and m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id
SELECT if(m.doctor_id = #{doctorId}, 0, 1) as flag, m.doctor_id, d.doctor_name FROM msg m, doctor d WHERE client_id = #{clientId} AND m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY flag
select client_id from msg where is_del = '0' and doctor_id = #{doctorId} order by create_time desc limit 0,1
